tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Finding a dentist who not only possesses exceptional skills but also ensures your comfort and peace of mind throughout the process is like discovering a hidden gem. Dr. Pallavi is undoubtedly a dental prodigy, and my experience with her has been nothing short of extraordinary.Having suffered from dentist phobia for as long as I can remember, I was genuinely apprehensive about my visit. However, Dr. Pallavi's gentle approach and reassuring words dissolved my fears and anxieties.Dr Pallavi is not only highly skilled but also very compassionate and friendly.
Without a doubt, Dr. Pallavi is the best dentist I have ever encountered, and I will gladly recommend her to all my family and friends.
Thank You Dr Pallavi and team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Implant Fixing,
review:
Dr Pallavi makes u feel spcl n is vry friendly n gentle while handling d instruments takin precautions not 2 cause u pain n aftr each treatment is done she assures dat her assistant cals u 2 check on ur welfare. Dr. Pallavi is prompt vt her timings n nvr keeps u waiting, in totality she’s A miracle worker
I am vry vry happy vt her overal skills n would recommend Dr.,Pallavi 2 every one who dreads dental treatment fr d fear of pain n discomfort Thank U Dr.Pallavi fr d beautiful experience of a painless treatment n long lasting one ☝️ A happy New Year 2023!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Pallavi has a pleasant disposition. 

I had a (partial) broken tooth of 3 yr vintage and has been wearing and got infected. Though i went with a reference and bit apprehensive, i quickly was at ease and could decide what to do, once she explained to me the condition of tooth and the options i had. 
She has good steady hands and her interaction during the consulting and during procedure is good. Has all the right comforting messages and advise during the act of remedy of the tooth. 
Tooth crown part of the treatment is scheduled next.
Iam satisfied with my "tooth RCT" experience at her clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I was previously a scaredy cat at the dentist. Dr. Pallavi Parekh is very efficient & friendly. She is really knowledgeable and her expertise is commendable. Her excellence , caring service given to me makes going to the dentist so much more favourable than trying to avoid the inevitable. Also, at such a short notice after informing the Doctor about the sharp pain of my wisdom tooth during such unprecedented situation I was worried but when I visited the clinic I was so much relaxed with so much hygiene, sanitisation, & precautions of Doctor & her staff as well. Also, the appointment system , reminder messages is commendable. I will highly recommend Dr. Pallavi to my family members and friends.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Both Dr. Bandish and Dr. Pallavi were amazing! They worked around my schedule to fit me in because I was traveling internationally. Even when the procedure got difficult they held their nerve and coordinated with multiple people to make sure and complete a 10-day treatment in less than 5. They both have an amazing capability of making you feel calm even with the scary drilling noises and very attentive if you are feeling any pain. Make sure to only visit them ******* **** ** **** *** *** **** ** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
i came without any appointment, cause urgent matters, everybody was super friendly, and no mich waitingtime.
clean, fast, super friendly
felt very safe and caretaken
would reccomend for sure

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Pallavi is a polite and pleasant person. She is very competent and carries out the work very diligently and without any discomfort. She is very encouraging and is always  cheerful. We travel long distances fo get our treatment from Parekh Dental Clinic.

tags: None
review: When I first started going to this surgery i was very scared . *** *** * *** ******* **** *** **** ** **** *********** *** **** ********** The dentist completely understood my fear and between the dentist and the dental nurse started to gently ease me in, I done know what there clever way was but it worked!!!! Since that 1st visit they have made me confident that I have all my treatment awake whereas before I had to be sedated for fillings. I find the surgery very clean as well as the reception area. I have after struggling for years found a dentist I trust.

tags: None
review: This was my first visit to Dr. Pallavi Parekh & Dr. Bandish Parekh for dental filling of my son Aarush and I was impressed by the professionalism and how sensitive they were to insuring a positive dental experience. Aarush was very much comfortable and had not complained for any pain. Simply it was a painless dental feeling. Doctors are great and makes sure you have all your doubts or questions answered. They explain the correct way to clean your teeth to avoid any future dental problems and appreciated how thoroughly everything was explained.

tags: None
review: Excellent. Both Doctors Ms Pallavi and Dr Mr Bandish make you so comfortable that your half of the pain is gone. I had gone there on 1st Feb'16 with a tooth ache. Diagnosis for root canal was done by Dr Pallavi and the procedure was handled by Dr Bandish. They explain the procedure to you through digital media. I was pleasantly surprised to get an sms from Dr Bandish enquiring about my tooth after the first sitting of my root canal procedure. The second sitting sms is instant as he enters your details in the data base. I am scheduled for my second sitting on 4th Feb'16 and I am looking forward to it.

tags: None
review:
The doctor was very professional and the equipment was state of the art. She was exceptionally mindful of my comfort and ensured that I was given a walk through of what procedure she intended to undertake before she began. Her husband Dr. Bandish was also around for a quick chat and I quite enjoyed the little dialogue we had in context to all my dental needs. The doctors accept payment via cards which was a big surprise to me since most doctors only take cash. She was also quick to schedule a followup meeting for next week where in we can look at more advanced options for my dental health. I am scheduled for this Saturday and will post more details then.
Cost of cleaning and polishing of teeth 1500. Appointment only. Minimal waiting time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Excellent experience as Dr Pallavi is efficient dentist and knows her job very well. 
Other than her subject she gave additional piece of advice that  not to leave sugar but to reduce to one third to reduce weight.
She has capability to chat on any topic during short breaks in treatment, which is really impressive  and one gets connected soon due to her friendly and caring nature.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Good behaviour, precautions taken for corona, provided safety kit. satisfaction with treatment given during fixing of crown. Fabriction of new crown is of good quality. Nice Time management, clean and hygiene atmosphere, Doctor and supporting staff is good in dealing.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She was very friendly and made me very comfortable on the chair... although it being my first time I wasn’t that uncomfortable or scared ... she explained me step by step procedure and carried on with the procedure very professionally and worked like an expert. She is highly professional and friendly at the same time and Works very well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor was super friendly and that's what made me very comfortable. Super professional and gave very clear instructions. The assistants and receptionist were very professional and friendly. I was updated of any delays also prior visiting. She also gave me post treatment care tips which was very nice. Thank you very much.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Very interactive with patient as well as accompanied relative / person.
Quick action on treatment required.

Dedication to work , and care for patient.
Even if there was no prior appointment but based on the emergency, doctor has agreed to check and diagnose.
 
Appreciate the care , dedication , simplicity shown by the doctor.

Highly Recommended...!!!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
The doctor was just best, the way of treatment is very good and friendly. She even understands people's opinions and try to remedy the patients according to there preferences and choices.
By, Manisha Pawar Mandpe.
Urmila Sakpal Kasare. 
Thks.
In respect to, Dr. Pallavi Parekh.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: Very sweet ,friendly & made me very comfortable .Dr also explained how I should maintain my teeth. Kept me busy with her talks that I did not feel any pain she was so gentle with her work. I spoke to my friend about Dr.Pallavi how friendly she was with me. I am looking forward in meeting  her. Thank you Dr. For taking care of me. Bye Love you

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Parekh is highly professional experienced articulate smart courteous person ,who knows her job v well.
She makes her patient feel at home by briefing in advance... so that patient feels comfortable.
Her staff is well trained well mannered n swift.
The environment is hygienic as per pandemic norms. 
It’s v clean pleasant n artistic  clinic 
Best of luck.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had a shooting pain in my lower jaw. I was quite apprehensive to visit a dentist in this Pandemic situation. However, I had to visit. I was quite amazed to see the precautions and measures taken at Parekh's clinic, whereas other clinics have become quite complacent in this regard. Kudos to d doctor n her team for a painless, safe and reassuring experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The doctor and her staff were both very patient and helpful .Dr Pallavi explained in detail about the procedure .She allayed all my fears regarding the Covid 19 .The clinic was very clean and all the SOP's were followed .
I would highly recommend her .
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words. We are glad to get acknowledgment for the SOP's. :)

tags: Wait time,
review:
Staff was very friendly and attentive. Took great care of hygiene and safety of the patients. Followed all the protocols and added more. 
Attention to details are with appreciating.
Doctor Pallavi is a beautiful combination of skill and compassion; a rare specie for n today’s world. 
Extremely worthy experience for a person who fears dentists! Entire team soothes your nerves!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Pallavi treated me very nicely and she explain the things and treatment is painless. One of my friend gave me the reference, before visiting her i was scared because of my past experience with dentist. *** *** ** ********** * **** **** ******** she handle the patient very carefully. Please do visit her for dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had just abt 7-8 teeth remaining n most of them were already shaking so she removed it so well it didn't pain much....n gave me the denctures...was facing difficulty in wearing them so had to visit the doc again so she explained it very politely n gave me the options how to wear it n how can get used it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was the first time I saw a Dr seriously concerned about the patient. She gave first prescription on SMS in the difficult period of Corona Lockdown.Further, she gave appointment on emergency call and treated me.Later she even asked about post procedure consultation on phone.My experience was overwhelming.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Pallavi is an excellent doctor. She heard my problem and immediately provided a solution. I went with tooth sensitivity and cavity problem. She did my teeth clean up which helped with my tooth pain. Going back to her this week for cavity issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Excellence in all dentistry ** ** ******* *** **** ***** ********* ** ** **** * **** ***** DOC always smiling never had to wait always a grt job done my experience with Dr. Pallavi Parekh will take me a long way shared a wonderful relationship with her highly respected n recommend to all no regrets

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr. Pallavi is a real professional, expert, kind and a good humanspirit. 
Her unbelievable attitude makes her different  towards other professional doctors.
Great service, great team, great guidance, quick treatment was what my sister and I experienced.
Thanks to Dr. Pallavi, and her team for such warm welcome and  amazing service.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My experience was gd wid Dr Pallavi as she's vry Proffessional n particular regarding  Time.. Talking abt her wrk u exp it urself it will a better ans.. 
As mentioned my experience was gd coz my job indeed was a big job Tooth Implant sounds scary itself and so was I scared but the Dr was clam wid me. She did her wrk asap wid accuracy wic was indeed required in my situation.. Over all  Good Quality was seen in her wrk n products both..   Vaishali Jadhav..

tags: None
review: At Parekh's dental clinic,  Dr Pallavi and Dr Bandish, both  are highly competent doctors. You can be assured of genuine high quality materials and equipments used during d treatment. I have never had an appointment that made me feel uncomfortable or in pain. This place is certainly for people  who r apprehensive about going to a dentist...highly recommended!!!

tags: None
review: Dr. Pallavi is very patient and makes it very easy for the patient. She explained me the process in detail before beginning with the implant. She is a thorough professional who executed the job flawlessly. Implants from what I have heard can be painful and difficult but my experience has been superb. Lined up for a second implant in a few weeks. Would definitely recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited Dr. Pallavi after loosing my teeth in a terrible accident; not only was she comforting and supportive, her clinic also felt like a cool place to be in. While on the chair, she gave me the feeling of being like a little child who has come to her for dental issues. Her treatments are not just good but also pain free. I would surely recommend people to visit her. The only issue one can face if not in the vicinity is to find the place as it is in the by lanes, apart from that, it would be a great experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Based on a friend's recommendation, I went in for a few fillings and scaling. Very hygienic environment, all staff wearing safety gear and following protocol. I was a bit apprehensive since I was going to the dentist after more than 2 years. However, Dr. PallaviI put me completely at ease. She did an excellent job, I had ZERO pain or discomfort during the procedure. Her calm demeanor and the soothing music playing at the clinic allows you to relax, making visits to the dentist less scary. Highly recommend Dr. Pallavi's for any dental issue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Friendly staff and doctor….Very professional about her job and also made sure to follow to ensure everything is fine…No pain and that’s what I love the most about this place ☺️…

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very professional , friendly and good treatment.  I have known the doctors for a couple of years and am satisfied with the treatment-

tags: None
review: Right from the initial preparation including providing pre-surgical dos and donts to post surgery care, i felt i was in the hands of a real professional dentists who really care for thier patients. Had no problems during or after the procedure was done. I would highly recommend Dr. Pallavi and Dr.Bandish to anyone who is considering any dental treatment.

tags: None
review: It was gud , taken care of   and   received  advice on the  same  ... it  was done  smoothly  and  honestly  did not  feel the  pain  . this  is  a  good  experience    and  this  couldn't   get better  for me.. would   recommed  Dr. Pallavi  to all my  family  and   friend  circle.

tags: None
review: I was only visiting India for one month last year and had received mouth pains so i was recommended by family members to go to her.I went and she was very smooth and recommended a very good gel for mouth pain,quadragel, which i still use today.She didn't pull my mouth uncomfortably and answered my questions promptly.I wish she lived in United States so she could be my dentist! ;)

tags: None
review:
Dr. Pallavi is a marvellous doctor. She understands her patients very well and has a friendly approach. She did a commendable job with my wisdom tooth. As this was my 1st extraction I was super nervous but inspite of meeting her 1st time I felt I have known her since long and she made me comfortable during the process.

Dr. Pallavi is 1 of the most efficient doctors I know.

tags: None
review: Great... Dr.  Pallavi has a very light hand.  She is very professional in her work,  with a very pleasant approach.  I have been her client for a long time.   It is worth the distance that I have to cover to reach her clinic in Bandra.  She is not money minded and always ready to cooperate in the best possible manner.   Friends I have recommended to her also share my view.   I would recommend her to others without faltering.   I wish her all the very best.

tags: None
review:
A very pleasant and memorable experience.  This time was my second visit to the doctor's clinic.  The first time was in 2009 for Root canal and capping of tooth.  This time also it is for the same job, but for a different tooth.  This time my wife too had accompanied me and underwent root canal job for her tooth complaint.
The doctor is really excellent and very confident in her work and precise.  she is almost like a Robot.  We wish her the very best and success in all her future endeavors.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doc is amazing with kids and adults. My son loves going to her and is very happy and always ready for his dental check ups. We can eat sweets with no worries 😉

tags: Value for money,
review: I am not sure what to expect in terms of fees. ************ *** ** *** *** ***** **** *** **** *** * ****** *** After you have already paid to have a mould done, should you be paying for the follow up consultation at all? Feels like you go there and you are at the clinic’s mercy. *** **** *** ** ******** *** ****** ******
reply_text:
We are disappointed know you gave us a thumbs down :(
Actually we were very clear from the start regarding consultation fees of 500/-
It is even mentioned on practo.
Follow up consultation went on for 30 mins along with the delivery of zero aligners.  We only charged you for the aligners. We did not charge you again for consultation, so we think you have misunderstood the same.
